question: The first Vaccination On Wheels(VOW) Clinic was launched by a fellow of IIT-Hyderabad in which of the following places?
explanation: The first Vaccination On Wheels(VOW) Clinic was launched by a fellow of IIT-Hyderabad in Pune, Maharashtra. The fellow names Jignesh Patel implemented the project in collaboration with the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF).
